pages.text: $(li)The Spider Eye is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fermented_spider_eye)Fermented Spider Eye$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Potion of Poison$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Finally, it can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/tarantula_hawk)Tarantula Hawks$(/l).

$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spiders$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cave_spider)Cave Spiders$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/plantain_spider)Plantain Spider$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) may drop this item on death.
